name: Broken Visage
originalText: Destroy target nonartifact attacking creature. It can't be regenerated. Put a black Spirit creature token into play with that creature's power and toughness. Sacrifice the token at end of turn.

rulings.text: The token creature enters the battlefield under your control regardless of who controlled the targeted creature.
The Spirit token has the power and toughness of the attacking creature as it last existed on the battlefield.

text: Destroy target nonartifact attacking creature. It can't be regenerated. Create a black Spirit creature token. Its power is equal to that creature's power and its toughness is equal to that creature's toughness. Sacrifice the token at the beginning of the next end step.
